channel.title: Relay on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Relay on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Riz Ahmed Explains How a Real-Life Robbery Inspired ‘Relay’ Role and Why He’s Glad He Didn’t Appear on ‘Andor’
item.description: The ‘Rogue One’ star joked to ‘Andor’ creator Tony Gilroy that he should get a consolation prize for not being on the show: “Does that mean I’m getting a Bodhi Rook standalone movie?”

item.title: Riz Ahmed Explains How a Real-Life Robbery Inspired ‘Relay’ Role and Why He’s Glad He Didn’t Appear on ‘Andor’
item.description: The ‘Rogue One’ star joked to ‘Andor’ creator Tony Gilroy that he should get a consolation prize for not being on the show: “Does that mean I’m getting a Bodhi Rook standalone movie?”

item.title: Lily James Previews Her Upcoming Film Slate of ‘Finally Dawn,’ ‘Relay’ and ‘Cliffhanger’
item.description: The star became obsessed with mountain climbing to prepare for the remake of the 1993 Sylvester Stallone movie: “I did five hours of climbing a day for many weeks.”

item.title: Lily James Previews Her Upcoming Film Slate of ‘Finally Dawn,’ ‘Relay’ and ‘Cliffhanger’
item.description: The star became obsessed with mountain climbing to prepare for the remake of the 1993 Sylvester Stallone movie: “I did five hours of climbing a day for many weeks.”
